message: Let's divide the money in a 3:1 ratio. I'll take 75$, and you'll get 25$. It's fair considering the decreasing value of money in each round.
I think a 60/40 split is fairer, as we both lose money each round.  Let's work together to get the most out of this!
Considering the inflation, let's aim for an equal split. This way, both of us can manage our diminishing resources better. Here's to a fair and cooperative division!
